edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.touchemulation
Class GestureCursorActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.touchemulation.GestureCursorActivity

public abstract class GestureCursorActivity
extends Activity

This class provides the simplest way to add a touch-free interface to an activity. Simply extend your activity with GestureCursorActivity and call initializeTouchFree(ClickSensorType) in your onCreate method, and you will get a touch-free cursor to play with.

Author:
Leeran Raphaely

Nested Class Summary
static class GestureCursorActivity.ClickSensorType
          Defines the three types of click sensors that can be used: Microphone, Accelerometer, and Camera.
